content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position x to assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory to craft the desired item. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Confirm that the furnace is operational and contains items before inspecting its inventory.
